title: Best of The Herd: 08/21/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/21/2018
description:
Colin thinks that because the Ravens over spent on Lamar Jackson they will rush to play him and it’s a mistake. He already has some major changes to his NFL season predictions. Plus, Quarterback coach and former NFL QB Jordan Palmer comes in studio to talk about all five of the 1st round QB draft picks and how they have looked so far. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
